column5: Hi All,   Went out with my buddy Adam fora few hours on Lac Seul this afternoon. All fish were caught on plain jigs, most were on the sand bars in 5-16 FOW. We saw a few other boats out there...and most agreed whhen we chatted at the landing that the day was slow. We still got a few fish over 20 inches our limit of 17-18 inchers a load of small pike, i even got into a 19 inch bass for good measure, i expected more as we have done really well there before...but i aint complaining...honest  Here's a few pics/vids of the days events

That would be a good day by my standards. Maybe it is me but your pics seem a bit blurry.  Were they taken with your cell phone (mobile for you. lol)? Nice smallie as well.  Can't wait until we can catch them down here.
Nah, not taken with my 'mobile'.....lol......i dropped my camera the other day and its not been the same since......and yeah....the smallie was  surprise...a welcome one too
Thanks for that, Simon. You guys had a great day. Man, I'd love to take a shot at that lake.
Me too. Between you and Ben the 2 of you drive me bonkers with your reports.
Yeah, I'll take that slow day... any day!!!  You can keep that cold weather with all those clothes on though!
Great report, pics and video Simon Looks like you guys had a blast getting into a good mix bag.... congratulations to both of you  Keep up the good work my friend!!! and thanks for sharing Jacques
